General.Name: Theranexus SA
General.Description: Theranexus société anonyme, a biopharmaceutical company, develops drug candidates for the treatment of central nervous system disorders. It has a advanced therapy candidate identification and characterization platform focuses on neurological disorders; and an initial drug candidate in clinical development for Batten disease. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Lyon, France.

1.Name: Mr. Mathieu  Charvériat
1.Title: Chief Scientific Officer, Deputy CEO & Director
